member_organisations: Landeshauptstadt Dresden, Landkreis Sächsische Schweiz-Osterzgebirge, Große Kreisstadt Pirna, Große Kreisstadt Dippoldiswalde
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Sport, Transport, Communication
eu_initiatives: INTERREG V initative, European Funds for Regional Development, Border focal point
organisation_name: Kommunalgemeinschaft Euroregion Oberes Elbtal/Osterzgebirge (KG Euroregion OE/OE)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
goals__remit: Foster cross-border cooperation in the Saxon-Czech border region in many fields of activity.
